FuncDef:
The reset cusp session command restarts a CUSP connection.
The reset cusp statistics command deletes CUSP packet statistics.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a controller IP address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To disconnect and reestablish a CUSP connection, run the reset cusp session command. This command helps verify the CUSP working process. Do not use this command in other situations.
Before you collect CUSP packet statistics in a CU separation scenario, run the reset cusp statistics command to delete existing CUSP packet statistics. Then, run the display cusp statistics command to view latest CUSP packet statistics.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
